dcterms:description: The ACDC dataset is used for automatic MRI cardiac multi-structures segmentation and diagnosis, providing a benchmark for evaluating deep learning techniques in cardiac imaging.
dcterms:title: Automated Cardiac Diagnosis Challenge (ACDC) dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Litjens

dcterms:description: The PROMISE12 dataset is designed for evaluating prostate segmentation algorithms for MRI, providing a standard benchmark for algorithm performance in prostate imaging.
dcterms:title: Prostate MR Image Segmentation 2012 Challenge (PROMISE12) dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Zhuang
J. Shen
dcterms:description: The MMWHS dataset is utilized for whole heart segmentation in MRI, featuring multi-scale patch and multi-modality atlases to enhance segmentation accuracy.
dcterms:title: Multi-Modality Whole Heart Segmentation Challenge (MMWHS) dataset
